name: Infernal Scarring
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."

editions.flavor: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

name: Infernal Spawn of Evil
text:
Flying, first strike
{1}{B}, Reveal Infernal Spawn of Evil from your hand, Say "It's coming": Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 1 damage to target opponent. Use this ability only during your upkeep and only once each upkeep.

name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil
text:
Flying, first strike, trample
If you say "I'm coming, too" as you search your library, you may pay {1}{B} and reveal Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil from your library to have it deal 2 damage to a player of your choice. Do this no more than once each turn.

name: Infernal Tribute
text: {2}, Sacrifice a nontoken permanent: Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"I would not barter my soul for any of the filth that they called power. So they took it from me and damned me to solitude."
—Crovax

name: Infernal Tutor
text:
Reveal a card from your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Inferno
text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

Enchant creature you control

{R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

name: Infiltrate
text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

text:
Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked by a creature, you may draw two cards.

editions.flavor: Neurok spies carry devices that let them look a few moments into the future, giving them an almost insurmountable edge.

name: Infiltrator il-Kor
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Suspend 2—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Infiltrator's Magemark
text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.

editions.flavor:
"In secrecy is strength. None can oppose one who cannot be found."
—Szadek

name: Infinite Authority
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with toughness 3 or less, destroy the other creature at end of combat. At the beginning of the next end step, if that creature was destroyed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on the first creature.

name: Infinite Hourglass
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Infinite Hourglass.
All creatures get +1/+0 for each time counter on Infinite Hourglass.
{3}: Remove a time counter from Infinite Hourglass. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

name: Infinite Obliteration
text: Name a creature card. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Infinite Reflection
text:
Enchant creature
When Infinite Reflection enters the battlefield attached to a creature, each other nontoken creature you control becomes a copy of that creature.
Nontoken creatures you control enter the battlefield as a copy of enchanted creature.

name: Inflame
text: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.

editions.flavor: Wound, maim, kill: it's all the same to a Keldon.

name: Interdict
text:
Counter target activated ability from an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land. That permanent's activated abilities can't be activated this turn. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.

name: Interplanar Tunnel
text: When you encounter Interplanar Tunnel, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal five plane cards. Put a plane card from among them on top of your planar deck, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom in a random order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

name: Interpret the Signs
text: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Draw cards equal to that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Intervene
text: Counter target spell that targets a creature.

editions.flavor:
"At first I simply observed. But I found that without investment in others, life serves no purpose."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Intervention Pact
text:
The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {1}{W}{W}. If you don't, you lose the game.

name: Intet, the Dreamer
text:
Flying
Whenever Intet, the Dreamer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled. You may play that card without paying its mana cost for as long as Intet remains on the battlefield.

name: In the Eye of Chaos
text: Whenever a player casts an instant spell, counter it unless that player pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: In the Web of War
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"In desperation, Konda sent warriors to parley with the ogre-magi. No one knows whether they were slaughtered at Shinka or if they even reached its bloodstained walls."

name: Intimidation

editions.flavor: "If they move, kill them. In fact, kill one now to make sure the other understands."

name: Intimidation Bolt
text: Intimidation Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature. Other creatures can't attack this turn.

editions.flavor: For hours afterward, all they could see was the grisly silhouette of their master, screaming.

name: Intimidator Initiate
text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

editions.flavor: Don't stand in his way, for his way is full of pointy things and fire.

name: Into the Core
text: Exile two target artifacts.

editions.flavor:
"They believe they're driving us back, but we're leading them to their doom."
—Kethek, furnace stoker

name: Into the Earthen Maw
text: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.

editions.flavor: "You may even see them again. Full digestion takes three hundred years."
